Host Mayo offers SSD KVM VPS with advance features like instant upgrades, DDOS protection, Gigabit Uplink and 24/7 Support. We have been in business since 2015. Over the span of last few years we have expanded our product range from simple web hosting to enterprise level VPS and dedicated servers. We offer exceptional customer support and guarantee 99% uptime.
